challenges.author: Orlando Guarnier
challenges.description: Go back to the 1800's in this challenge. You must only carry items a Victorian-era hunter would!

challenges.author: Insym
challenges.description:
You're initially allowed a Photo Camera and a flashlight. Nothing else! Every photo that is successfully tagged in the evidence book will give you a random item, limited to 2 photos per type (max 2 interaction photos, 2 fingerprints, etc). Objectives also provide you with a random item. Ghost photo is worth 2 items!
Important note: accessory items don't mean the main items have been obtained. If you get a tripod, for example, it doesn't mean you can also take the video camera and vice-versa

challenges.author: Insym
challenges.description: You're initially allowed to use every item. Once you discover the ghost this round, you're not allowed to use its evidence the next one. For example: you identified your current ghost as being a Spirit, therefore UV Lights, Spirit Box and Ghost Writing Book are no longer allowed for your next investigation.
